channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists just found rare spores inside a fossil older than dinosaurs
item.description: Scientists reclassified a long-misunderstood fossil from Brazil as a new genus, Franscinella riograndensis. Using advanced microscopy, they discovered...

item.title: What happens to your body when you eat too many ultra-processed foods

item.title: Mysterious “quantum echo” in superconductors could unlock new tech

item.title: How the brain decides which moments you’ll never forget

item.title: Cocoa supplements show surprising anti-aging potential
